text: @realDonaldTrump Stop your lying!!! We will never forget how you stonewalled Americans by lying to everyone early in while you golf! You still don’t have the Pandemic under control and your constant false lying is not Helping!!! #RealisticAmerican #COVID19 #COVID19  #RepublicansAreKillingUs

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
